title: Savoury winter pancakes
ingredients: ['For the pancake', '125g plain white flour', '2 eggs', '300ml milk (or mixture of milk and water)', '1 tablespoon cooking oil', 'For the filling', 'oil, as needed for cooking', '1 knob butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1/4 large red cabbage, finely chopped', '1 tart apple (e.g. Cox) - peeled, cored and chopped', '1 handful raisins', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '50g grated mature cheese of your choice']
